description: Miyokichi is Shin`ichirou`s good friend, and has known him since they were kids. They hang out together at school, and Miyokichi often brings up the fact that Shin`ichirou has an eye out for Hiromi when at school. Shin`ichirou introduced Miyokichi to Aiko which eventually led to Miyokichi asking out Aiko, and she agreed, though it is apparent that she agreed reluctantly.
name: Nobuse Miyokichi
